mapper.insert: insert into rdos_engine_job_cache( job_id, engine_type, compute_type, stage, job_info, node_address, job_name, job_priority, group_name) values(#{jobId}, #{engineType}, #{computeType}, #{stage}, #{jobInfo}, #{nodeAddress},#{jobName},#{jobPriority},#{groupName});
mapper.select: select * from rdos_engine_job_cache where job_id=#{jobId} and is_deleted=0 order by gmt_create desc limit 1;
select job_name from rdos_engine_job_cache where job_name like '%${jobName}%' and is_deleted=0;
SELECT DISTINCT(node_address) as nodeAddress FROM rdos_engine_job_cache WHERE is_deleted = 0

SELECT count(1) as count FROM rdos_engine_job_cache WHERE engine_type = #{engineType} and group_name = #{groupName} and stage = #{stage} and is_deleted = 0
and node_address = #{nodeAddress}
SELECT DISTINCT(CONCAT(engine_type, '_', group_name)) as jobResource FROM rdos_engine_job_cache WHERE is_deleted = 0
